page.title: 04South Cantley First School.
page.content: Until{1983}the school was called {Partridge Primary School.}It then changed its name to{South Cantley {First School}as a result of school reorganisation in the{Doncaster}area. The school has two buildings,the older one being built in{1964}at a cost of{Â£62,000.}The more modern part of the school was built in{1977.}Each building has its own classrooms, toilets hall and staffroom.The older and much larger building houses the school kitchens,secretary's room and headteacher's office.Also in this building there are two upstiars classrooms.Surrounding each part of the school there are playgrounds and grassed areas.The main school playing field however is situated near to the main school building.Although the school is sited near to{Goodison {Boulevard}the address is{Grange Road.
